QuestData.Title: Reunited
QuestData.Description: You look at me and see I am no great warrior. Why was I chosen to be a Paragon? Not all weapons can be seen, Wakener. One should not judge by appearance alone.$b$bBefore I explain further, I need to know that you are trustworthy.$b$bSomething precious to me was hidden at the time of my preservation. I am nothing without it.$b$bDefend me as I unearth my greatest weapon, and you will have my trust.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assist Kaz'tik the Manipulator as he unearths his greatest weapon.
QuestData.RewardText: Kovok is just as impressive as the last time I saw him. He will ensure great victories for the Klaxxi.

Objectives.Objective: Escort Kaz'tik the Manipulator to the Undisturbed Dirt
